name: Matlab2Octave
body:
### Welcome to Matlab2Octave.
Hello Everyone. Thanks for taking time to visit my simple project Matlab2Octave. I program a lot in a different languages. One of it is Matlab. Octave is a free software that is almost compatible with matlab. You need some syntax modifications to make the Matlab code work in Octave. For people who cannot afford a Matlab license, Octave is their best bet. This compiler converts Matlab code into **syntactically correct** Octave code.

### Documentation
Please read the documentation for this project at https://github.com/adhithyan15/matlab2octave/wiki/Documentation to learn more about how to use this project for your purpose.

### Issues
Please post your issues in on the issues tab. I will take a look into it as soon as possible.  

### Authors and Contributors
This project was completely written from scratch by me(@adhithyan15). I am sophomore in college who is really interested in open source technologies. Visit my other ongoing projects at https://github.com/adhithyan15/. 

### Support or Contact
If you need any help read the documentation or email me at adhithyan15 at gmail dotcom.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
